response.name: Download Object
response.body:
# This YAML file contains nginx & csi opensds driver objects,
# which are necessary to run nginx with csi opensds block driver.

apiVersion: storage.k8s.io/v1
kind: StorageClass
metadata:
  name: csi-sc-opensdsplugin-block
provisioner: csi-opensdsplugin-block
parameters:
  attachMode: rw
  profile: f063883c-6429-4592-addb-9834f9b61a3f
allowedTopologies:
- matchLabelExpressions:
  - key: topology.csi-opensdsplugin-block/zone
    values:
    - default
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  name: csi-pvc-opensdsplugin-block
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 1Gi
  storageClassName: csi-sc-opensdsplugin-block

---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-block 
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
      protocol: TCP
    volumeMounts:
      - mountPath: /var/lib/www/html
        name: csi-data-opensdsplugin 
  volumes:
  - name: csi-data-opensdsplugin
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: csi-pvc-opensdsplugin-block
      readOnly: false
